activities: Sailthru’s customers can use Sailthru Smart Data™ technology to personalize their engagement with their users through email, website and mobile media. Sailthru’s customers may provide Sailthru with personal information about their users, such as users’ names, email addresses, and demographic information.    Sailthru may also receive data about its customers’ interactions with their users, such as whether the user opened emails sent by the customer and what pages the user visited on the customer’s website.  Sailthru uses this data to personalize communications between the customer and their users.  Sailthru’s customers agree to only send email to users that have consented to receive email from the customer.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer/Client Data, Organization Human Resources Data
